basics.name: Tim Jefferies
basics.label: DevOps and Solutions Architect
basics.summary: An accomplished and adaptable DevOps and Solutions Architect, possessing extensive expertise in system architecture and cloud technology. A track record of successfully building, delivering, and maintaining business and technology solutions in diverse sectors, including internet hosting, finance, charitable organizations, retail, and RPA. Boasting a comprehensive technical background and exceptional problem-solving skills, consistently bridging the gap between organizational requirements and cutting-edge technologies. Applies advanced strategies that align with enterprise and technical standards to drive ongoing improvements. Possessing strong communication skills, able to translate complex technical concepts into easily digestible formats for both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Creates collaborative environments and effectively manages expectations to deliver superior results.

work.summary: DevOps Engineer for QA team, supporting Blue Prism RPA Automation SaaS with Azure CI/CD pipelines. Skills used: Terraform, Ansible, Packer, Jenkins, Azure DevOps, Git, Powershell, Python, and Bash.
highlights: Re-designed Azure pipelines that build custom pre-baked Windows images for QA testing. The original developer couldnâ€™t resolve the constant pipeline breakages and reliability issues. Rebuilt the pipeline to install updates correctly using Ansible and implemented failovers for times of heavy Azure usage.

Built automated testing environments using a Jinja2 template dynamically creating Ansible playbooks tailored to user specs, drastically reducing bottlenecks during installation of Microsoft SQL and Windows environments, saving countless hours.

Migrated from colocated servers into Azure pipelines, redesigning QA testing infrastructure using Testrail, Terraform, and Ansible via CI/CD, resulting in a modern, resilient, and efficient QA process.

work.summary: Supported migration of bare metal servers into the cloud as part of consolidation efforts after acquiring 19 companies.
highlights: Mapped current infrastructure using Visio and proposed CI/CD models for migration, including cost analysis and technology research.
Built initial pipelines and environment, creating scalable Ansible/Terraform template libraries.
Authored policy documents to standardize Git workflows, DevOps workflows, and process documentation.

work.summary: Managed online operations for a UK charity, including full infrastructure design using AWS and redevelopment of their entire online presence.
highlights: Designed and implemented AWS-based architecture: EC2, SES, S3, VPC, Elastic IP, ELB, snapshots, volume management.
Built bespoke servers with LEMP, NGINX, MYSQL, Redis, OPCache, EXIM via Ansible.
Implemented encrypted backups with Rclone/Duplicity to S3, Dropbox, SSH. Wrote failover and risk management procedures.
Developed unattended software upgrades and Docker-based services.
Created custom plugins and themes for Wordpress, S3-hosted websites, WooCommerce-based payment solutions.
Integrated Airtable CRM via Wordpress sync.

work.summary: Managed core Drupal/Linux server infrastructure, performance testing, and process automation.
highlights: Conducted system administration, architecture review, and management of LEMP/Drupal stack.
Performed testing using JMeter and ApacheBench.
Resolved issues with Drupal caching layers and MariaDB.
Built multi-server MySQL Master/Slave clusters.
Managed server configurations via Bitbucket Git.
Created CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and handled load balancer configuration.

work.summary: Freelance consulting for electrical supply store.
highlights: Repaired and virtualized LedgerSMB accounts system with automated VMware backups.
Managed PostgreSQL scripting and administration.
Migrated accounts to Inuit Quickbooks Pro.
Redesigned ecommerce website using Magento.

work.summary: Built solutions for network payment gateway under the infrastructure manager.
highlights: Installed/configured HSM hardware and security keys within a datacenter.
Installed/administered Windows and Linux server images.
Managed Windows Server patching, configured servers for PCI compliance.
Research, implementation, documentation of infrastructure solutions.
Set up HAProxy load balancing and 2FA solutions (Duo/Azure).
Implemented automated backup scripts.

work.summary: Customer support for dedicated hosting customers and server infrastructure.
highlights: Installed and managed dedicated rack servers including virtualization.
Met ticketing SLA targets.
Handled migrations, automation scripting, and process documentation.
Supported FreeBSD, Ubuntu, CentOS, Windows servers hosting over 6000 clients.
Configured/maintained mail servers and performed database/web server tuning.
Used CLI, cron, bash/python scripting, and monitoring tools like Nagios/Cacti.
Trained in Parallels Plesk.
